sentences.en: After the Norman Conquest the forest became a royal hunting preserve.
sentences.cn: 诺曼征服之后，这片森林成为了皇家狩猎区。

sentences.en: Bad driving is not just the preserve of boy racers.
sentences.cn: 不良驾驶不仅仅是飙车小子们才会做的事。

sentences.en: Crabtree & Evelyn has just launched a new jam, Worcesterberry Preserve.
sentences.cn: 瑰珀翠刚推出一款新果酱——伍斯特浆果果酱。
酸性土壤容易保持 吗 ?

sentences.en: He was anxious to preserve his reputation.
sentences.cn: 他急于维护自己的名声。

sentences.en: It is the duty of the police to preserve public order.
sentences.cn: 维护公共秩序是警察的职责.

sentences.en: Names of people in the book were changed to preserve anonymity.
sentences.cn: 为了姓名保密，书中的人用的都是化名。

sentences.en: Our company promises to preserve the anonymity of all its clients.
sentences.cn: 我们公司承诺不公开客户的姓名.

sentences.en: The park was created to preserve some of the forests upstate.
sentences.cn: 这个公园是为了保护该州最北部地区的一些森林而建的。

sentences.en: The planners decided to preserve their distinct identities.
sentences.cn: 设计者们决定保留他们各自的特色.

sentences.en: Their main job is to preserve health rather than treat illness.
sentences.cn: 它们的主要功效是保健而非治病。
他们必须维护他们的团结.

sentences.en: They were fighting in order to preserve their independence.
We must encourage the planting of new trees and preserve our existing woodlands.
sentences.cn: 我们必须鼓励栽种新树木，同时也要保护现有的林地。

sentences.en: We must preserve our natural resources.
sentences.cn: 我们必须保护自然资源.

sentences.en: What can we do to preserve the company from ruin?
sentences.cn: 我们怎么做才能保护这家公司不破产?

words.tran_cn: 可保存的；可保管的；能储藏的
防腐的；有保存力的；有保护性的
保护者，保护人；保护剂，防腐剂；储藏柜
保护区；禁猎地；加工成的食品

trans.tran_cn: 蜜饯，果酱，腌菜，专属工作，保护区，私人渔猎场

trans.tran_en: to save something or someone from being harmed or destroyed
to save something or someone from being harmed or destroyed
